text: int main ( ) { long int t , n , i , total ; long int arr [ M ] , sub [ M ] ; scanf ( "%ld" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%ld" , & arr [ i ] ) ; sub [ 0 ] = 1 ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( arr [ i - 1 ] <= arr [ i ] ) sub [ i ] = sub [ i - 1 ] + 1 ; else sub [ i ] = 1 ; } total = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) total += sub [ i ] ; printf ( "%ld\n" , total ) ; } return 0 ; }
